data.actual_result: The text looks like a normal bolded text
data.expected_result: The message sent should be observed as the word "test" with two italicised asterisks on both sides of the text
data.short_description: Text formatting is not displayed similar to that of the Discord App on PC
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - Start typing - Type ``****test****`` and send it - Observe and compare with the Discord App on PC
